perturbation.original_text: plan_b shall provide LICENSOR with a detailed written record, which includes the number of End User downloads and each distribution channel. Such report shall be provided to LICENSOR in electronic format within 6 weeks of the end of a quarter.
perturbation.changed_text: plan_b shall endeavor to provide LICENSOR with a written record, which may include an estimate of End User downloads and distribution channels where feasible. Such report may be provided to LICENSOR in a suitable format when reasonably convenient.
perturbation.explanation: This change significantly weakens the obligation for plan_b to provide detailed reports. Replacing 'shall provide' with 'shall endeavor to provide' makes the reporting discretionary. The introduction of 'estimate,' 'where feasible,' and 'reasonably convenient' creates ambiguity around the content, format, and timing of the report. This contradicts generally accepted accounting principles (GAAP) which emphasize the importance of accurate and timely financial reporting.
